frozen.name: tryton
frozen.shortDescription: The client of the Tryton application platform
frozen.longDescription:
The client for Tryton, a three-tier high-level general purpose
application platform under the license GPL-3 written in Python and using
PostgreSQL as database engine.

It is the core base of a complete business solution providing
modularity, scalability and security.

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later
